name: ES 15-Minute Opening-Range Volatility Breakout
description: Intraday trend-following strategy that trades the E-mini S&P 500 futures contract (ES) on 15-minute bars. It employs the Single-Day Volatility Breakout Detector to capture early-session breakouts above/below the regular-session opening range, confirmed by elevated volume. Only one trade per session is allowed. Positions are sized to risk 1.5 % of account equity, a 0.5 % fixed stop is placed immediately, and all positions are closed at the session close or on a counter breakout.
